mapper.select: select id,geNumber,geName,userState,phone,email,date_format(createTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime,date_format(updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as updateTime from user where userState != "删除" and geNumber like CONCAT('%',#{parameter},'%') or geName like CONCAT('%',#{parameter},'%') or phone like CONCAT('%',#{parameter},'%') or userState = #{parameter}
